/usr/bin/cc   -O3 -Wall   CMakeFiles/pi_display.dir/main.c.o CMakeFiles/pi_display.dir/object.c.o  -o pi_display -Wl,-rpath,/media/nfs/workspace/PiDisplay/build/device:/opt/vc/lib:/media/nfs/workspace/PiDisplay/build/device/ssd1306:/media/nfs/workspace/PiDisplay/build/driver:/media/nfs/workspace/PiDisplay/build/driver/bcm:/media/nfs/workspace/PiDisplay/build/driver/linux -rdynamic device/libdevice.so -lm -lavformat -lavdevice -lavcodec -lavutil -lx264 -lpthread -lz -lbz2 -ldl -lswscale /opt/vc/lib/libmmal.so /opt/vc/lib/libmmal_core.so /opt/vc/lib/libmmal_vc_client.so /opt/vc/lib/libmmal_components.so /opt/vc/lib/libmmal_util.so -lfreeimage device/ssd1306/libdevice_ssd1306.so driver/libdriver.so driver/bcm/libdriver_bcm.so /usr/local/lib/libbcm2835.a driver/linux/libdriver_linux.so /opt/vc/lib/libbcm_host.so
